name: Emagypeels
description:
Emagypeels is about trying to sleep using different strats(watching TV, turning the lights off, listening to some music, ...) while multiple stuff are annoying you(people, sounds, demons, ...) until you can't sleep anymore.

PLAY THE ALPHA NOW! BROWSER VERSION MAY NOT WORK AS GOOD AS THE DESKTOP VERSION (RECOMMENDED).

CONTROLS:

-Left Mouse Button (TV, Light Switch & LAD(the person at the window))

-"R" (Restart game)

-Left Control (Live Ceiling Reaction) [WINDOWS VERSION ONLY]

-"Z" (Live Ceiling Reaction) [BROWSER VERSION ONLY]
